Summary: Tucson 9/27/2011 Three glowing green orbs in triangle pattern hover above mountain, shoot into sky after 15 minutes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Oro Valley
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsHanging out with some friends in Oro Valley last night and saw these weird lights in the sky over the mountains. I pointed it out to my friends and they both saw exactly what I saw. Three green lights hovering over the mountains (My phone clock said 9:33PM) I didn't know who to contact about it but I saw this website and figured I'd give my testimony. I witnessed three bright green glowing orbs over the mountains North of the Tucson area. I've never really been one to belive in UFOs before, but I saw this thing shoot into the air after fifteen minutes... and no man-made craft does that. Whatever it was, it was pretty damn big. I don't want to sound like some insane person right now. But... I was with a group of people and they all saw it, too. They all shrugged it off but I know that stars and man made aircrafts don't look like that. Did anybody else see them?
